name: Midnight Oud
short_description: Fragrance that pulls people in without a word.
full_description: When night falls, sweetness meets mystery. Vanilla and caramel melt into warm amber and soft spices, wrapping you in comfort and quiet confidence. A scent that feels like elegance after dark.
product_description:
Scent Profile:
– Top Notes: Pink pepper, Juniper, Violet
– Heart Notes: Toffee, Cinnamon, Lavender, Sage
– Base Notes: Vanilla, Amber, Tonka Bean, Suede

Intensity:
Eau de Parfum — made with high-grade oils for depth, warmth, and allure.

Size:
50ml / 1.7 fl. oz.

Made in:
Crafted with fine perfume oils from Grasse, France.

name: Pinnaris
short_description: A scent of freshness and warmth that brings the spark.
full_description: A fresh and warm fragrance that awakens hidden emotions and revives sweet memories, leaving a scent so intimate that with every breath it feels as if you are being savored.
product_description:

– Top Notes: Aldehyes, Bergamot, Ginger, Lemon, Mint
– Heart Notes: Apple, Violet Leaf, Pineapple, Sage, Geranium

Intensity:
Eau de Parfum — made with high-grade oils for depth, warmth, and allure.

Size:
50ml / 1.7 fl. oz.

Made in:
Crafted with fine perfume oils from Grasse, France.

name: After Hours
short_description: A fragrance of temptation and unforgettable memories.
full_description: Fresh yet warm, a scent of woods and amber that brings back lost moments, stirs the heart, and keeps the feeling alive through the night.

name: Frost Wood
short_description: Cold at first, hot at the finish, just the way you like it
full_description: Crisp, fruity-cold opening gives way to bold leather and smoky undertones. Hints of musk, tropical woods, and moss create a magnetic, unforgettable trail. Masculine, fresh, and irresistibly alluring.
product_description:
Scent Profile:
– Top Notes: Bergamot, Black Currant, Apple, Lemon, Pink Pepper
– Heart Notes: Pineapple, Patchouli, Moroccan Jasmine
– Base Notes: Birch, Musk, Oak moss, Cedarwood, Ambroxan

Intensity:
Eau de Parfum — made with high-grade oils for depth, warmth, and allure.

Size:
50ml / 1.7 fl. oz.

Made in:
Crafted with fine perfume oils from Grasse, France.

full_description: The scent of a man you can never catch, effortlessly alluring, exuding confidence, and wrapped in timeless, old-money elegance.

name: Canna
short_description: Sexy, classy, with a scent of desire.
full_description: A scent of roses and fresh green notes with just the right touch of sweetness. Subtle musky and patchouli undertones leave an elegant trail that captivates, stirs desire, and draws the eyes with effortless grace. Sexy, classy, and always unforgettable.

name: Immortal Kiss
short_description: Sweet at first, but loses its taste at the end
full_description: Our sweetest fragrance, a captivating blend of white florals, vanilla, and warm spices for an alluring and elegant impression. Subtle notes of amber, cacao, and powdery undertones leave a trail of charm and sensual allure. Sexy, sophisticated, and always unforgettable.
product_description:

– Top Notes: Almond, Coffee, Bergamot, Lemon
– Heart Notes: Tuberose, Jasmine Sambac, Orange Blossom, Bulgarian Rose, Orris

name: Sugared Nectar
short_description: A fragrance that reaches every corner, countless glances
full_description: A captivating blend of fresh, ripe fruits and delicate blossoms, this fragrance lingers in the air with an undeniable elegance. Its sophisticated aroma creates a lasting impression, effortlessly drawing attention and leaving a trail of charm wherever you go.
